decentralizedExchanges.name: BasicSwapDEX
decentralizedExchanges.description: Trade crypto directly with other people, no sign-ups, no middleman (atomic swaps).

decentralizedExchanges.name: Bisq
decentralizedExchanges.description: Peer-to-peer exchange where you trade directly with other people. Supports BTC → XMR swaps.

decentralizedExchanges.name: Eigenwallet
decentralizedExchanges.description: A highly liquid platform for swapping BTC into XMR using atomic swaps.

decentralizedExchanges.name: RetoSwap
decentralizedExchanges.description: Decentralized peer-to-peer exchange built on Monero. Supports fiat, crypto ↔ XMR trades.

swapAggregators.name: CypherGoat
swapAggregators.description: Service that finds routes for secure crypto-to-crypto swaps across different providers.

swapAggregators.name: OrangeFren
swapAggregators.description: Beginner-friendly site that lets you compare and make crypto swaps, usually without creating an account.

swapAggregators.name: Trocador
swapAggregators.description: Aggregator that focuses on privacy-friendly swap routes.

centralizedExchanges.name: Bitfinex
centralizedExchanges.description: Trading platform with a wide range of cryptocurrencies and derivatives.

centralizedExchanges.name: Kraken
centralizedExchanges.description: Well-known exchange with strong fiat support and advanced trading features.

centralizedExchanges.name: KuCoin
centralizedExchanges.description: Popular exchange known for its large selection of altcoins, including Monero.
